wiki.summary: "Off The Record" is a song recorded by South Korean girl group IVE for their debut Korean-language extended play, I'VE MINE. It was released on October 6, 2023 as the EP's second single. The track was written by Seo Ji-eum, composed by Ryan Jhun, Sivert Hagtvet Hjeltnes, Bård Bonsaken and Hilda Stenmalm & arranged by Jhun and Hjeltnes. The track interpolates "Memory" from the 1981 musical Cats, composed by English composer Andrew Lloyd Webber & "Lovefool" by Swedish rock band The Cardigans. Read more on Last.fm.
